game.name: Dementium II HD
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The visage of doctors and patients alike fade in and out of these nightmarish visions of tortured memories. This eggshell reality is fractured by experiments conducted in the ward. Blood, flesh and screams surround as you put together the pieces of your story and make your escape from the Bright Daw
game.shortDescriptionEn: The visage of doctors and patients alike fade in and out of these nightmarish visions of tortured memories. This eggshell reality is fractured by experiments conducted in the ward. Blood, flesh and screams surround as you put together the pieces of your story and make your escape from the Bright Daw

reviewHighlights.text: [h1]사지 마세요[/h1] -단점 너무나 구린 그래픽. 게임 시작하자 걸린 진행불가 버그. 바닥에 참기름이라도 발랐는지 미끌거리는 조작감. 내가 공격하는건지 적이 날 때리는지 구분이 가지 않는 피격모션과 타격음. 게임 분위기에 비해 지나치게 밝은 BGM. -장점 ND...
